title: Stabilizing Neighborhoods: Lessons Learned from the Field
content: For release on delivery   10:45 a.m. EDT  September 1, 2010            Stabilizing Neighborhoods:  Lessons Learned from the Field      Remarks by   Elizabeth A. Duke     Member   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     At    REO & Vacant Properties:  Strategies for Neighborhood Stabilization     Board of Governors     Washington, D.C.      September 1, 2010
